dev.jeka.core.api.java.project

Class JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.jeka.core.api.java.project.JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T>

  • public class JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles project compilation step. Users can configure inner phases by chaining runnables. They also can modify JkJavaCompiler and JkJavaCompileSpec to use.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      T __
      For parent chaining

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep apply(java.util.function.Consumer<JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep> consumer)

      • run

        public void run()
        Performs entire compilation phase, including :
        • Generating resources
        • Generating sources
        • Processing resources (interpolation)
        • Compiling sources

      • runIfNecessary

        public void runIfNecessary()
        As #run but perform only if not already done.

      • getBeforeGenerate

        public JkRunnables getBeforeGenerate()
        Returns the runnables to run prior source and resource generation. User can chain its own runnable to customise the process. Empty by default.

      • getAfterGenerate

        public JkRunnables getAfterGenerate()
        Returns the runnables to run after source and resource generation. User can chain its own runnable to customise the process. Empty by default.

      • getSourceGenerator

        public JkRunnables getSourceGenerator()
        Returns the runnables generating sources. User can chain its own runnable to customise the process. Empty by default.

      • getResourceGenerator

        public JkRunnables getResourceGenerator()
        Returns the runnables generating resources. User can chain its own runnable to customise the process. Empty by default.

      • getCompiler

        public JkJavaCompiler<JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T>> getCompiler()
        Returns the compiler compiling Java sources of this project. The returned instance is mutable so users can modify it from this method return.

      • getAfterCompile

        public JkRunnables getAfterCompile()
        Returns the runnables to be run after compilation. User can chain its own runnable to customise the process. Empty by default.

      • getSourceEncoding

        public java.lang.String getSourceEncoding()
        Returns encoding to use to read Java source files

      • setSourceEncoding

        public JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T> setSourceEncoding(java.lang.String sourceEncoding)
        Set the encoding to use to read Java source files

      • getCompileOptions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCompileOptions()
        Returns extra compile options passed to the compiler

        public JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T> addOptions(java.lang.String... options)
        Adds options to be passed to Java compiler

      • getResourceProcessor

        public JkResourceProcessor<JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T>> getResourceProcessor()
        Returns the resource processor.

      • getJavaVersion

        public JkJavaVersion getJavaVersion()
        Gets the Java version used as source and target version

      • setJavaVersion

        public JkJavaProjectMakerCompilationStep<T> setJavaVersion(JkJavaVersion javaVersion)
        Sets the Java version used for both source and target.

      • getComputedCompileSpec

        public JkJavaCompileSpec getComputedCompileSpec()
        Computes and returns the compile specification to pass to Java computer. The returned result is created at each invokation and modify it has no side effect.
